meloutils.settings.keepChat.description: Keeps chat even if switched server or disconnected. You can still clear chat with F3+D.
meloutils.settings.chatWidthMultiplier.d: The multiplier of focused chat width.
meloutils.settings.chatWidthFlex.descrip: Expand chat width only when needed.
Prevent any form of item damage from resetting block breaking progress.
meloutils.settings.initialBlockActionCoo: Keep the first few cooldown for block actions.
meloutils.settings.revealEnchantment.des: Reveal enchantment in the enchanting table.
meloutils.settings.fixHorizontalScroll.d: Reveal enchantment in the enchanting table.
meloutils.settings.keepF1NameTag: Keep Name Tag When F1 is Enabled
meloutils.settings.keepF1NameTag.descrip: Keeps player name tag even when F1 is enabled.
meloutils.settings.noItemFrameHitbox.des: Don't render item frame hitbox in F3+B.
meloutils.settings.autoJump360.descripti: Enables auto jump in all directions.
meloutils.settings.pauseRenderOnPrtScn.d: Pauses some mod render like GlowItem when PrtScn is pressed.
meloutils.settings.disableOffhandInterac: Disables some item's offhand interaction defined in the list.
The list of items for Disable Offhand Interaction.
